  • Method Details

    • getLoginPage

      @RequestMapping(value="/", method=GET) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getLoginPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets login page. Checking for an active session is done by HTTP REQUEST, because every access to the BEAN session will create an unnecessary session
      Parameters:
      model - the model
      request - the request
      Returns:
      the login page

      Sets user. Takes care of duplication
      Parameters:
      first_name - the first name
